Verses: 1 avan Naatkalile Baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaar Vandhaan; Yoyaakkeem Moondru Varusham Avanai Seviththu, Pinbu Avanukku Virodhamaagak Kalagampanninaan.

2 appozhudhu Karththar Kaldheyarin Thandugalaiyum, Seeriyarin Thandugalaiyum, Movaabiyarin Thandugalaiyum, Ammon Puththirarin Thandugalaiyum, Avan Mel Varavittaar; Theerkkadharisigalaagiya Thammudaiya Oozhiyakkaararaikkondu Karththar Sonna Vaarththaiyinpadiye Avar Avaigalai Yoodhaavai Azhikkumpadikku Varavittaar.
3 manaase Than Ellaa Seygaigalinaalum Seydha Paavangalinimiththam Yoodhaavaith Thamadhu Samugaththai Vittu Agatrumpadi Karththarudaiya Kattalaiyinaal Appadi Nadandhadhu.
4 avan Sindhina Kutramatra Raththaththirkaagavum Erusalemaik Kutramatra Raththaththaal Nirappinadharkaagavum Karththar Mannikka Siththamillaadhirundhaar.
5 yoyaakkeemin Matra Varththamaanangalum, Avanseydhavai Yaavum, Yoodhaavudaiya Raajaakkalin Naalaagamap Pusthagaththil Allavo Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.
6 yoyaakkeem Than Pidhaakkalode Niththiraiyadaindhapin, Avan Kumaaranaagiya Yoyaakkeen Avan Sthaanaththil Raajaavaanaan.
7 egipthin Raajaa Appuram Than Dhesaththilirundhu Purappattu Varavillai; Egipthin Nadhithuvakki Aipiraaththu Nadhimattum Egipthin Raajaavukku Irundha Yaavaiyum Baabilon Raajaa Pidiththirundhaan.
8 yoyaakkeen Raajaavaagirapodhu Padhinettu Vayadhaayirundhu, Erusalemile Moondru Maadham Arasaandaan; Erusalem Ooraanaagiya Elnaaththaanin Kumaaraththiyaana Avan Thaayinper Negusthaal.
9 avan Than Thagappan Seydhapadiyellaam Karththarin Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Seydhaan.
10 akkaalaththile Baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaarin Sevagar Erusalemukku Vandhaargal; Nagaram Mutrikkai Podappattadhu.
11 baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaarudaiya Sevagar Nagaraththai Mutrikkai Podugaiyil Avan Thaanum Adharku Virodhamaai Vandhaan.

12 appozhudhu Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Yoyaakkeenum, Avan Thaayum, Avan Oozhiyakkaararum, Avan Prabukkalum, Pradhaanigalum Baabilon Raajaavinidaththirkup Purappattupponaargal; Avanaip Baabilon Raajaa Than Aalugaiyin Ettaam Varushaththile Pidiththuk Kondaan.

13 angeyirundhu Karththarudaiya Aalayaththin Sagala Pokkishangalaiyum, Raajaavudaiya Aramanaiyin Pokkishangalaiyum Eduththukkondu, Isravelin Raajaavaagiya Saalomon Karththarudaiya Aalayaththil Undaakkiyirundha Pon Panimuttugalaiyellaam, Karththar Solliyirundhapadiye Udaiththuppottu,

14 erusalemiyar Anaivarum Sagala Prabukkalum Sagala Paraakkiramasaaligalumaagiya Padhinaayiramperaiyum, Sagala Thachcharaiyum Kollaraiyum Siraipidiththuk Konduponaan; Dhesaththil Ezhai Janangale Allaamal Veroruvarum Meedhiyaayirukkavillai.
15 avan Yoyaakkeenaiyum, Raajaavin Thaayaiyum, Raajaavin Sthreegalaiyum, Avan Pradhaanigalaiyum, Dhesaththin Paraakkiramasaaligalaiyum Erusalemilirundhu Baabilonukku Siraipidiththukkonduponaan.

16 ippadiye Baabilon Raajaa Paraakkiramasaaligalaana Manusharaagiya Ezhaayiramperaiyum, Thachcharum Kollarumaagiya Aayiramperaiyum, Yuththampannaththakka Balasaaligalaiyum Baabilonukku Siraipidiththukkonduponaan.
17 avanukkup Padhilaagap Baabilon Raajaa Avan Siriya Thagappanaagiya Maththaniyaavai Raajaavaaga Vaiththu, Avanukku Sidhekkiyaa Endru Maruperittaan.
18 sidhekkiyaa Raajaavaagirapodhu Irubaththoru Vayadhaayirundhu, Padhinoru Varusham Erusalemile Arasaandaan; Lipnaa Ooraanaagiya Eremiyaavin Kumaaraththiyaana Avan Thaayinper Amuththaal.
19 yoyaakkeem Seydhapadiyellaam Avanum Karththarudaiya Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Seydhaan.

20 erusalemaiyum Yoodhaavaiyum Karththar Thammudaiya Samugaththaivittu Agatrith Theerumalavum, Avaigalinmelulla Avarudaiya Kobaththinaal Ippadi Nadandhadhum Allaamal, Sidhekkiyaa Baabilonile Raajaavukku Virodhamaagak Kalagamum Panninaan.
